title: Il Forno
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Italian restaurant that imports ingredients from Italy. "Il Forno" means oven, and the kitchen bakes dishes in a unique stone oven. Has a few lacto-vegetarian salads, pasta, a vegetable soup, and pizza; a few items can be made vegan on request. Pesto is supposed to be vegan but do ask.
